changeSet.sql: insert into roles_privileges values ( (select id from roles where "name" like 'DEFAULT'), (select id from "privileges" where "name" like 'READ_API'))
insert into roles_privileges values ( (select id from roles where "name" like 'DEFAULT'), (select id from "privileges" where "name" like 'READ_PRIVILEGE'))
